question: When after burning the jet pipe will:

choices.choice: Close to allow for the decreased volume of gas.
Open to allow for the increased volume of gas.
Remain the same
Remain the same until the temperature reaches 1700C then open.

subject: Technical

question: When does the variable nozzle open?

choices.choice: When the exhaust temperature reaches 1700C
Automatic when after burning selected.
Automatic on take off.
Automatic when approaching Mach 1.

subject: Technical

question: When leaving the turbine the gas stream:

choices.choice: Increases velocity immediately to maximise thrust.
Is diffused to ensure the afterburning flame is stabilised.
Goes through a convergent duct to ensure the after-burning flame is stabilised.
Goes through a divergent duct to maximise thrust.

subject: Technical

question: Which of the following statements are correct with regard to after-burning? 1.Fuel consumption increases 2.Fuel consumption decreases .3 Pressure thrust decreases ,4 thrust increases, 5 pressure thrust increases, 6 EGT increases ,7 EGT decreases ,8 Thrust decreases.
subject: Technical

question: On a turbojet aircraft which of the following statements would be correct with the introduction of water into the combustion chamber?

choices.choice: Power can be restored up to its flat rated 100% only, and is prevented from exceeding its limitations due to a pressure sensor at the high pressure outlet.
Power can be restored up to its flat rated 100% only, due to a pressure sensor at the combustion chamber outlet.
Power can be restored up to its flat rated 100% only, due to a pressure sensor in the exhaust.
Power can be augmented above100% due to the denser mixture impinging on the turbine, which consequently drives the compressor quicker.

subject: Technical

question: In a turboprop aircraft with water methanol injection in the combustion chamber, which of the following statements would be correct?

choices.choice: SHP can be re-established up to 100% only, when operating in warmer climates.
SHP can be increased beyond 100% by maintaining the RPM and increasing the blade angle.
SHP can be increased beyond 100% by increasing RPM and decreasing the blade angle.
SHP can be increased beyond 100% by maintaining RPM and decreasing the blade angle.

subject: Technical

question: Water Methanol is injected into an engine so that the combustion chamber inlet temperature is reduced and there is:

choices.choice: A substantial power decrease.
A substantial power increase with no increase in fuel flow.
A substantial power increase which is due solely to the combustion of methanol.
An increase in power output solely due to the increased fuel flow, since methanol does not burn.

subject: Technical

question: When methanol is added to a water injection system:

choices.choice: It is an important source of fuel.
It is an anti-freeze.
It is an important source of fuel and an anti-freeze.
The temperature of combustion remains the same.

subject: Technical

question: Water injection is used for take off:

choices.choice: To cool the combustion chambers.
To cool the turbine blades.
Only at high altitude airfields where the prevailing temperature is high.
At airfields with an ambient temperature above 30F

subject: Technical
